steps.2: Microwave-Microwave for 3 minutes, stirring in between
steps.3: Add-Add 1/2 tbsp sweet and sour sauce to the bowl
steps.4: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 tbsp shredded cheddar cheese on top of the egg
steps.5: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
steps.6: add-Extract and add contents of an egg to a microwave-safe bowl
steps.7: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to another into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.8: Pour-Pour egg mixture on top of the tortilla
steps.9: Add-Add 1 tbsp salsa to the bowl
steps.10: Place-Place 8 inch tortilla on a cutting board
